data.description: Students will undertake a short, intensive period of study at an overseas host university. Learning will focus on the business environment in the host country with particular reference to economic, political and cultural factors. Students will be encouraged to identify and examine business opportunities between their own and the host country. Site visits, guest lecturers and cultural activities will complement the study program.
data.title: International Study Experience
